page.title: 14LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: In Norwich there is a group of people{elected by us, the residents of {Norwich.}These people are from the various{political parties.}We pay rates to{the council}and in return they provide us with essential services. The council provide us with the{Police, Fire and Ambulance {services.}They provide care for old people and a meals-on-wheels service. They have home helps to do housework for disabled people who cannot do it themselves. They provide the{courts}to punish criminals and the probation service to reform offenders. They provide{schools and colleges}for {education.}They{rent out houses}to people. The council bulid parks and gardens for our leisure. They{clean {and repair the roads}so they are safe for us to use. The coucil build {libraries}for us to use in our leisure
